@Misterbossftw wrote:

I am having a [size=14pt]HUGE[/size] problem… I am editing the slayer shop and then i re-did my errors then when i compile it says this…
I do not know how to fix this… “Illegal start expression”? its the same as all the other ones… please help me!
When i removed that line it just said the next line is an illegal start expression

if anyone knows what to do im 60% sure i can reward you ingame.
or anyother way just please help.I think it has something to do with this section

		case 13858; ///Blazed Pkz Slayer Master

return 350;

ive been working at this for 3 hours…
